description: Residents of the Mile High City know inclement weather all too well. When it feels like winter in the morning and summer by the afternoon, their Denver Go Far. Feel Good.™ Graphic Long Sleeve Tee knows just what you need. A blend of durable, quick-drying polyester and performance-ready Merino help with moisture management, temperature regulation, and odor resistance. Plus, it has offset shoulder and side seams to keep you going in comfort, as well as a body-skimming fit that moves with you. So no matter how the temps change, you’ll feel comfy and dry, day to night.
name: Denver Go Far Feel Good Graphic LS Tee - Unisex
